import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; export default function MyVerticallyCenteredModal(props) { return ( Donate to LinageeVerifier

Click "Donate" to make a one-time donation of 0.015 ETH to LinageeVerifier. As a thank you for your donation, you will receive 50 FREE credits that can be used for OpenSea Match Checks & Zero Fee Gas Saving Single Transactions.



"Upon clicking Donate, you will get a metamask pop-up for a one-time donation of 0.015 ETH + gas. Hit confirm & wait for transaction confirmation."

); }
